DEVA.IS.summary: Deva Holding A.S. manufactures and sells pharmaceutical products in Turkey. The company provides antineoplastic and immunomodulating agents; dermatological products; sysyemic hormanal preparations; anti-infective and antiparasitic products for systemic use; food supplements; and electrolyte solutions. It also offers products in the areas of urogenital system and sex hormones, blood and blood forming organs, cardiovascular system, musculoskeletal system, nervous system, alimentary tract and metabolism, respiratory system, and sensory organs. In addition, the company offers animal health products and active pharmaceutical ingredients, eye drops, medical ampoules for sterile injectable products, and cologne. It also exports its products to approximately 60 countries. The company was founded in 1958 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey. Deva Holding A.S. is a subsidiary of EastPharma SARL.

ECILC.IS.long_name: EIS Eczacibasi Ilaç, Sinai ve Finansal Yatirimlar Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
ECILC.IS.summary: EIS Eczacibasi IlaÃ§, Sinai ve Finansal Yatirimlar Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S., together with subsidiaries, engages in health and real estate development businesses primarily in Turkey. The company's Health segment produces and sells human health and veterinary medicines. Its Real Estate Development segment develops real estate properties. The company was founded in 1951 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey. EIS Eczacibasi IlaÃ§, Sinai ve Finansal Yatirimlar Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. is a subsidiary of Eczacibasi Holding A.S.

FONET.IS.summary: Fonet Bilgi Teknolojileri Anonim Sirketi provides computer software and technical support services for public and private institutions in Turkey. The company offers consulting services in the information technology sector; software development and technical support services; system integration and turnkey project services; and training services. It also provides software management software, which includes Hospital Information Management Systems; Laboratory Information Systems; Hospital To Hospital; and Operational Business Intelligence. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Ankara, Turkey.

LKMNH.IS.long_name: Lokman Hekim Engürüsag Saglik, Turizm, Egitim Hizmetleri ve Insaat Taahhüt A.S.
LKMNH.IS.summary: Lokman Hekim EngÃ¼rÃ¼sag Saglik, Turizm, Egitim Hizmetleri ve Insaat TaahhÃ¼t A.S. owns and operates hospitals in Turkey. It offers various medical and laboratory services. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Ankara, Turkey.

MPARK.IS.summary: MLP Saglik Hizmetleri A.S. provides healthcare services in Turkey. The company operates diagnosis and treatment units. It operates 29 hospitals. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

RTALB.IS.long_name: RTA Laboratuvarlari Biyolojik Urunler Ilac ve Makine Sanayi Ticaret A.S.
RTALB.IS.summary: RTA Laboratuvarlari Biyolojik Urunler Ilac ve Makine Sanayi Ticaret A.S. engages in the research, development, and production of microbiology and molecular biology products in Turkey. It offers microbiology products, including petri dish, tube and bottle, chromogenic media, blood culture bottle, tuberculosis diagnostic, rapid test, microbiological stain, hygislide, surcheck media, membrane, and swab products; and molecular biology products, such as nucleic acid isolation kits, real time PCR kits, and voltran viral load detection systems, as well as diagnovital SARS-CoV-2 multiple, a real-time RT-PCR-based test for the detection of the 2019 novel coronavirus. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in Kocaeli, Turkey.

SELEC.IS.long_name: Selçuk Ecza Deposu Ticaret ve Sanayi A.S.
SELEC.IS.summary: SelÃ§uk Ecza Deposu Ticaret ve Sanayi A.S. operates as a distribution channel between pharmaceutical manufacturers, and hospitals and pharmacies. The company was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. SelÃ§uk Ecza Deposu Ticaret ve Sanayi A.S. operstes as a subsidiary of SelÃ§uk Ecza Holding A.S.

SEYKM.IS.summary: Seyitler Kimya Sanayi A.S. manufactures and sells medical adhesive and surgical tapes, wound dressings, first aid plasters, and capsicum rheumatism and perforated plasters in Turkey. It also provides injection and wound care products. The company serves government, private hospitals, medical wholesalers, and pharmacies. It also exports its products worldwide. The company was founded in 1991 and is based in Turgutlu, Turkey.

TRILC.IS.long_name: Turk Ilac Ve Serum Sanayi Anonim Sirketi
TRILC.IS.summary: Turk Ilac Ve Serum Sanayi Anonim Sirketi produces and sells human pharmaceuticals and vaccines in Turkey. It offers vaccines, basic IV solutions, premix solutions, hemodialysis solutions, sterile distilled water, diagnostic products, and immunostimulant products. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Ankara, Turkey.
